# PLAYER::GET_WANTED_LEVEL_RADIUS

## Summary
Gets the centre position of the current players wanted area

## Parameters
* **INT** wantedLevel

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Remnant from GTA IV. Does nothing in GTA V.
